metadata.name: Burning Heart
metadata.description: "Burning Heart" invites us to embrace the fire within, to harness our deepest emotions and channel them towards meaningful pursuits. It serves as a reminder that even in the darkest of times, our hearts possess an untamed spark that can fuel our dreams and ignite positive change. This captivating artwork portrays a heart engulfed in vibrant flames, symbolizing the passionate intensity and indomitable spirit that resides within each of us.
